mapper.update: update bt_cft set info_id = #{infoId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bt_cft_classic_lowenergy = #{btCftClassicLowenergy,jdbcType=BIT}, bt_cft_count = #{btCftCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, bt_cft_freq = #{btCftFreq,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, bt_cft_result = #{btCftResult,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, bt_cft_judgement = #{btCftJudgement,jdbcType=BIT}, bt_cft_time = #{btCftTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, bt_cft_delete = #{btCftDelete,jdbcType=BIT} where bt_cft_id = #{btCftId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select bt_cft_id, info_id, bt_cft_classic_lowenergy, bt_cft_count, bt_cft_freq, bt_cft_result, bt_cft_judgement, bt_cft_time, bt_cft_delete from bt_cft where bt_cft_id = #{btCftId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select bt_cft_id, info_id, bt_cft_classic_lowenergy, bt_cft_count, bt_cft_freq, bt_cft_result, bt_cft_judgement, bt_cft_time, bt_cft_delete from bt_cft
